amendment.description: Amendment provides funding to eligible institutions that serve small businesses in communities that have suffered negative economic effects as a result of the Deepwater Horizon oil spill with particular consideration to States along the coast of the Gulf of Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to provide funding to eligible institutions that serve small businesses in communities that have suffered negative economic effects as a result of the Deepwater Horizon oil spill with particular consideration to States along the coast of the Gulf of Mexico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cao amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 0, 1 Present (Roll no. 372).
